Articles.Content:
G'day all!

Been a long time coming but I've finally signed up to the forums after playing KSP for a long while (since 0.15). Really wanted to get more involved in the community seeing as we are getting so close to Beta!

On a side note, I am an avid flight sim and simpit enthusiast and I am currently designing and testing setups for my own KSP simpit controller, which I plan to document and post here of my progress.

Happy and safe flying everyone!

G'day.

Got into the mods yet? There's a lot available to improve the spaceplane experience if that's what you're into.

G'day.

Got into the mods yet? There's a lot available to improve the spaceplane experience if that's what you're into.

Absolutely, had many many mods installed over the years. But lately I've just been playing the stock game with a few minor upgrades (ie, Kerbal alarm clock, engineer, RPM etc) I don't like to use ksp for realism like my flight sims, but I am very keen on building a cockpit for the game!
Welcome aboard! We look forward to seeing your thing take shape.
